findings.title: Unvalidated _openingTime Input
findings.description: Consider adding a check to ensure the openingTime provided is greater than the current time.

findings.title: Insecure Opening Time
findings.description: The constructor does not check if the provided openingTime is greater than the current time.

findings.title: Consider adding a check for _closingTime in the constructor
findings.description: Ensure the closingTime provided is greater than the opening time.

findings.title: Ensure closingTime is greater than opening time
findings.description: Add a check to ensure the provided closingTime is greater than the opening time.

findings.title: Consider adding a check for wallet in the constructor
findings.description: Consider adding a check to ensure the wallet provided is valid.
